content.description:
PORTUGUESE IVORY PLAQUE REPRESENTING THE CHRIST CHILD ON A SAILING SHIP, PRODUCED IN PORTUGUESE GOA,* EARLY SEVENTEENTH CENTURY

Â© The Trustees of the British Museum

*Goa is located on the southwestern coast of India.
content.question: The production of the plaque in Goa is best understood in the immediate context of which of the following?

choices.label: The decline of Asian states such as the Mughal Empire

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
